thread.title: Area Sports Roundup for Monday, Oct. 12
thread.title_full: Area Sports Roundup for Monday, Oct. 12

author: Observer-Dispatch
title: Area Sports Roundup for Monday, Oct. 12
text: Area Sports Roundup for Monday, Oct. 12 Area Sports Roundup for Monday, Oct. 12 Comment Posted Oct. 12, 2015 at 11:24 PM By Observer-Dispatch Posted Oct. 12, 2015 at 11:24 PM GIRLS SOCCER New Hartford 2, Marcellus 2 (OT) Marcellus (9-1-4): Jada Sargeant 1-0, Ashley Gilmore 1-0, Liz White 0-1. Emily Buschbascher 2 saves. New Hartford (10-0-0, 12-1-1): Christina Paul 1-0, Hannah Cahill 1-0, Micaela Honsinger 0-1. Gabby Hobika 2 saves, Abby Buchholz 4 saves. Halftime: 1-1. BOYS SOCCER Cooperstown 4, Westmoreland 0 Cooperstown (6-0, 11-2): Christian Sepp 1-0, Max Clinton 1-0, Jack Lambert 1-0, Calvin Sandler 1-0, Tanner Clinton 0-1, Ted Mebust 0-1. Sean Mebust 2 saves. Westmoreland (0-7, 2-12): Luke Fredsell 22 saves. Halftime: 0-0. Waterville 3, Frankfort-Schuyler 0 Frankfort-Schuyler (1-3-2, 2-11-2): Tyler Karpowich 10 saves. Waterville (3-4, 7-7): Joe Coffman 2-0, Josh McNamara 1-1, Austin Furner 0-1, Zach Beach 0-1. Keith Prindle 2 saves. Halftime: Waterville 3-0. Hamilton 10, Herkimer 1 Hamilton (4-1-1, 10-3-1): Eamon Pendleton-Witherspoon 2-0, Geordi Geier 1-0, Skyler Lemal-Brown 1-0, Dakota Thomas 1-0, Diego Kagle 1-0, Brian Meeks 1-0, Ryan Tuttle 1-0, Zach Coddington 1-0, Josh Farrar 1-1. Michael Hershey 2 saves, Cameron Fry 4 saves. Herkimer: Joe Vincent 1-0. James Heyck 6 saves. Halftime: Hamilton 6-1. HIGH SCHOOL FIELD HOCKEY Little Falls 4, New York Mills 1 Little Falls: Izzy Battisti 1-0, Sydney McCarthy 2-1, Morgan Slabe 1-1, Laura Wind 0-2. Carolyn Alford 2 saves. New York Mills: Alyssa Fuccillo 1-0, Brianna Fuccillo 0-1. Madison Cudhea 9 saves. WOMEN'S SOCCER HCCC 4, Hudson Valley 0 HCCC (12-1-0): Michaela Bianca 2-2, Teigha Ward 1-1, Alexys Bolton 1-0, Grace Johnson 0-1. Sydney Stanley 7 saves. HVCC (8-3-2): Teller Wood 7 saves, Madelyn Welch 0 saves. Halftime: HCCC 1-0. MEN'S SOCCER HCCC 2, Hudson Valley 0 HCCC (10-2-0): Thomas Callister 1-0, Kevin Van der Silk 1-0, Femi Kaffo 0-2. Morrice Baker 2 saves. HVCC (11-2-1): Joshua Rasmussen 7 saves. Halftime: HCCC 1-0.
